mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, SPORTS_KR_NAME, MEMBER_NO, SPORTS_CODE,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM "BOARD_IMG" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) THUMBNAIL,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END "BOARD_WRITE_DATE"
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "SPORTS_TYPE" USING(SPORTS_CODE) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND SPORTS_CODE = #{sportsCode}
AND BOARD_CODE = 1
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM "BOARD_IMG" WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY IMG_ORDER
SELECT MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER JOIN ATTEND_MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.PROFILE_IMG, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER m JOIN ATTEND_MEMBER a ON m.MEMBER_NO = a.MEMBER_NO JOIN BOARD b ON a.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO WHERE b.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY b.MEMBER_NO

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_COUNT_LIMIT, MEETING_LOCATION, TO_CHAR(MEETING_DATE, 'MM"월" DD"일" "("DY")" HH24"시" MI"분"') MEETING_DATE,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM "BOARD_IMG" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS THUMBNAIL,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ATTEND_MEMBER" A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) ATTEND_MEMBER_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) LIKE_CHECK
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 1 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, SPORTS_KR_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_COUNT_LIMIT, MEETING_LOCATION, MEMBER_NO, SPORTS_CODE, TO_CHAR(MEETING_DATE, 'MM"월" DD"일" "("DY")" HH24"시" MI"분"') MEETING_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'MM"월" DD"일" "("DY")" HH24"시" MI"분"') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM "BOARD_IMG" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) THUMBNAIL,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ATTEND_MEMBER" A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) ATTEND_MEMBER_COUNT
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "SPORTS_TYPE" USING(SPORTS_CODE) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND SPORTS_CODE = #{sportsCode} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_INTRODUCE, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" JOIN "BOARD" USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTEND_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
